WorkflowCategories.description: Root object containing a collection of workflow category definitions used to organize workflows in the BRC Analytics platform.

workflow_categories.description: Collection of workflow category entries that will be used to group and organize workflows in the BRC Analytics interface.

WorkflowCategories.title: WorkflowCategories

WorkflowCategory.description: Definition of a workflow category used to group related workflows for organization and display purposes.

category.description: The unique identifier for the workflow category, used to link workflows to their respective categories.

description.description: A detailed description of the workflow category explaining its purpose and the types of workflows it contains.

name.description: The human-readable display name of the workflow category as it will appear in the BRC Analytics interface.

show_coming_soon.description: Boolean flag that determines whether to display a 'Coming Soon' indicator for this category in the BRC Analytics interface when workflows in this category are not yet available.

target_pages.description: List of pages where workflows in this category should be available (e.g., assemblies page, organisms page).

WorkflowCategory.title: WorkflowCategory

WorkflowCategoryId.description: Set of IDs of workflow categories.
WorkflowCategoryId.title: WorkflowCategoryId

WorkflowTargetPage.description: Set of pages where workflows can be targeted.
WorkflowTargetPage.title: WorkflowTargetPage
